SELECT e.emp_num, e.emp_name, e.emp_tel, e.emp_email, d.dept_name AS deptName, r.rank_name AS rankName FROM employee AS e LEFT JOIN department AS d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN rank AS r ON e.rank_id = r.rank_id WHERE e.${select} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
